item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign DLC ‘The Forsaken Hollows’ announced
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Bandai Namco and developer FromSoftware have announced Elden Ring Nightreign downloadable content “The Forsaken Hollows.” It will launch on December 4 for $15 / 1,760 yen.

Here is an overview of the downloadable content, via its Steam page:

About

“The Forsaken Hollows” includes two additional Nightfarers, and one new Shifting Earth, and more!

Artbook and Mini Soundtrack

This application allows players to enjoy viewing concept art and listening to in-game music of Elden Ring Nightreign exclusive to the ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN Deluxe Edition and Deluxe Upgrade Pack.

Elden Ring Nightreign is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC “The Forsaken Hollows” Announce Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/elden-ring-nightreign-dlc-the-forsaken-hollows-announced

item.title: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect X announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Due out on February 12, 2026.

Publisher Astrolabe Games and developer 91Act will release side-scrolling roguelike action game BlazBlue: Entropy Effect for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch on February 12, 2026 as BlazBlue: Entropy Effect X, the companies announced. Physical editions will be available for PlayStation 5 and Switch, day and date with the digital release. Physical and digital pre-orders are available now.

BlazBlue: Entropy Effect first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on August 15, 2023, followed by a full release on January 31, 2024, followed by iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play on July 22, 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Astrolabe Games:

About

BlazBlue Entropy Effect X is a roguelite action game set in the BlazBlue universe, featuring striking 2D visuals, stylish, fast-paced combat, and precise, responsive controls.

Command a line-up of unique characters from the renowned BlazBlue franchise and dive into an unparalleled action experience.

Story

At a mysterious domain, known as “the Lab,” a group of elite researchers race to save a collapsing word; however, despite their efforts to date, Dr. Mercurius, head of the laboratory, still warns the world’s downfall is near.

In a last-ditch effort, the urgent Research of Possibility initiative seeks to collect Shards of Possibility – a special fragment of the world that could forestall the seemingly inevitable destruction. These shards lie within the Sea of Possibility, a realm between worlds, beyond the bounds of reality. The protagonist, Ace, is the only being capable of diving into this sea. Guided by the elite researchers at the Lab, Ace descends again and again in pursuit of salvation—until strange visions take hold and his body begins to change.

As Ace continues to dive, countless memories flood his mind, and the truth behind the collapsing world – and the research itself—begins to surface….

“……The Power of Azure.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Specifications

  • Name: BlazBlue Entropy Effect X
  • Developer: 91Act
  • Publisher: Astrolabe Games
  • Platforms: PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S
  • Language: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Spanish,
  • Brazilian Portuguese, Korean, Russian.
  • Game Editions:
    • Standard Edition ($24.99 / €24.99)
      • A copy of Blazblue: Entropy Effect X
    • Deluxe Edition ($34.99 / €34.99)
      • A copy of Blazblue: Entropy Effect X
      • BlazBlue Character Palette [The Other Side] (14 Characters)
        (This set will receive additional palettes for any characters added in future updates.)
      • BlazBlue Character Palette [X-File] (14 Characters)
        (This set does not include palettes for future characters. Separate purchases may be required.)
      • BlazBlue: Entropy Effect X Complete Original Soundtrack (five sets / 91 tracks total)
      • Four chibi avatars

Notes

  1. The Deluxe Edition bonus content may be offered later separately as “Upgrade” downloadable content.
  2. All Deluxe Edition content will be available at the time of release.
  3. The exact design and content, along with the release schedules are subject to change.
  4. Some features may require the latest version of the game and the console to access.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

English

Japanese

Korean

Traditional Chinese

Simplified Chinese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/blazblue-entropy-effect-x-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-switch

item.title: BrokenLore: ASCEND announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Tower-climbing survival horror.

Serafini Productions has announced tower-climbing survival horror game BrokenLore: ASCEND for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). It will launch in summer 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Serafini Productions:

BrokenLore: ASCEND is a first-person psychological horror game about obsession, fame, and fear. Join Ren and Yui, two renowned rooftop climbers, as they attempt a forbidden nighttime ascent of Japan’s tallest building, the mysterious Elysium Tower.

What begins as the ultimate stunt for their channel, SKYLIMIT, soon spirals into a nightmare. A supernatural entity, the Rokurokubi, emerges to haunt them, a twisted reflection of their deepest terror: becoming forgotten and irrelevant.

The higher they climb, the more reality unravels. For Ren and Yui, stopping means losing everything, but reaching the top might cost them their sanity or their lives.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/brokenlore-ascend-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

item.title: BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW launches January 16, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Deluxe edition includes exclusive additional ending.

Survival horror game BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on January 16, 2026, publisher Shochiku and developer Serafini Productions announced.

The game will be available in $19.99 standard and $24.99 Deluxe editions. The Deluxe edition includes the original soundtrack, a customizable pet, an exclusive additional ending, and 24 hours of advanced access (PlayStation 5 only).

Here is an overview of the game, via Serafini Productions:

About

BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW is a surreal first-person horror game that will push you to the edge of your seat. You play as Anne, a victim of bullying, trapped in a nightmarish world where you must escape from terrifying monsters while uncovering a dark mystery.

Anne must come to terms with her past’s most painful choices. However, she’s not alone. Many horrible creatures wander around and follow her every step… Will Anne be able to get out?

BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW delves deep into pressing social issues, shining a spotlight on the insidious influence of social media.

Its themes are profound, exploring the intricacies of mental health, body dysmorphia, and the horrors of bullying.

The cast features The Sphere Hunter, Akidearest, Elsie Lovelock, Sharla in Japan, Knite, Kin Ryan, and more!

Key Features

  • Multiple endings will be influenced by the various choices made throughout the game.
  • Distinctive, eerie creatures will each symbolize a different trauma experienced by Anne.
  • Emphasis will be placed on Anne’s smartphone, which will feature numerous functions.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Release Date Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/brokenlore-unfollow-launches-january-16-2026
